availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Mason County, Kentucky, laborer. Native of Ireland. Married to Julia Gain Caughlin. Father of Nannie Caughlin and Daniel Caughlin. Laborer in Mason County, Kentucky, in 1860. Convicted of selling liquor to an enslaved person by the Mason Circuit Court in October 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mason County, District 2, p. 103.
Tenth Manuscript Census of the United States (1880), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mason County, Washington, p. 119.
"John Coughlin (1812-1900)," Find A Grave, Memorial 185529939, accessed November 1, 2023, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/185529939.
Kentucky Death Certificates, 1911-1965, Kentucky Office of Vital Statistics, KDLA, Frankfort, KY, File 3240.
